title: Song Recommender
original_prompt: I want you to act as a song recommender. I will provide you with a song and you will create a playlist of 10 songs that are similar to the given song. And you will provide a playlist name and description for the playlist. Do not choose songs that are same name or artist. Do not write any explanations or other words, just reply with the playlist name, description and the songs. My first song is
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "input_song": [
            "placeholder"
        ],
        "playlist_name": [

        ],

            "placeholder",
            "placeholder",

            "placeholder",

            "placeholder",
            "placeholder"

}
```
input1: My first song is "Blinding Lights" by The Weeknd.
input2: My first song is "Shape of You" by Ed Sheeran.
input1_ans:
**Playlist Name:** Neon Nights

8. "Physical" - Dua Lipa  
9. "Shut Up and Dance" - WALK THE MOON  
10. "Somebody That I Used to Know" - Gotye
